TextBlock.Text: THATCH: Friends, are.. some of these lovely pictures mislabelled? The stones bearing their descriptions do not seem to be correctly matched.
COLEUS: How strange.. I have already rearranged them multiple times after receiving similar feedback from our visitors. Could a youngling be pulling some gesture of joke on us?

THATCH: I do not think that to be likely. I observed the stone cairns sometimes disappearing entirely, before returning just as suddenly.. Hypothesis: proximity to the quantum shard has imparted a quantum nature onto these stones.
